location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Copy Telegram from the Foreign Secretary, Camp Delhi to Sir Lewis Pelly, Baroda

mods.abstract: Telegram informing Pelly that the Gaekwar's position for the period between the end of the Commission and the announcement of the Government of India's decision will be the same as between the issue of the Proclamation and the assembly of the Commission and that Solicitors and other individuals can continue to see him under the same conditions as previously.
